target:
"

Most interesting bar to note: 
Women tended to have higher sentence complexity than men and non binary across all gender interests,
but especifally for women looking for women, where the median sentence complexity was 24.658% (Q1=9.091%, Q3=28.571%),
compared to men looking for women (median=14.194%) and non-binary looking for women (median=18.824%).
